title: As a BOC Admin, I want a new "MN Payroll" widget under the Contracts tab on the Player Profile page
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the Contracts tab on a player profile
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new widget called MN Payroll
AND the widget will appear immediately below Minor League Bonus Payments
AND next to the widget name, there will be a dropdown menu to select a specific year
AND all years will be the default option
AND selecting the specific year will only display rows for that year
AND the widget will have the following columns, showing an overview of the player's earnings during the different training periods:
- Year
- Org
- Level
- Club
- Total
- Winter Training
- WT Days(x)
- Spring Training
- ST Days(x)
- Champ Season
- CS Days
- Post Season
- PS Days
- AFL
- AFL Days
- Fall Training
- FT Days(x)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a new "MN Payroll" tab under the Minor Contracts dashboard
custom_preconds:
BOC View Wireframe: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_boc&c=1|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_boc&c=1|smart-link] 

Club View Wireframe: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_club&c=1|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_club&c=1|smart-link]
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Minor Contracts tab/dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new tab called "MN Payroll"
AND this tab will appear after Intl Signing Bonus and above Payment Tracker
AND at the top of the page, there will be a dropdown menu to select a year
AND in the the MN payroll tab, under the year selection dropdown, there will be three collapsible sections:
- ORG Summary
- Player Summary
- Breakdown

title: As a BOC Admin, I want an Update Dates button on the Breakdown table for MN Payroll
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Minor Contracts tab, there will be a MN Payroll tab with a collapsible  Breakdown table
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a MN Payroll tab with a collapsible Breakdown table
AND on the bottom right corner of the Breakdown table, there will be an "Update Dates" button
AND once a player is selected & the user clicks on the button, a modal will appear that will allow one to edit the dates that player reported to training for selected period
AND the modal will have the player's name displayed under the Update Dates header
AND there will be a ddropdown menu under the player name to select the training period
AND there will be a table to add date ranges that the player reported to training
AND user will see the following action buttons - 
** Action buttons:
*** Add date range - add a new row for date range
*** Trashcan button to delete date range row
*** Update - to save changes
*** Cancel
AND There will be a warning text above the Update and Cancel buttons that says:
AND This will overwrite any existing dates the player has for the period
AND Users will only be allowed to specify dates within the selected training period

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see a daily salary detail in the Breakdown section in the MN Payroll tab in Minor Contracts
custom_preconds:
BOC View Wireframe: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_boc&c=1|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_boc&c=1|smart-link] 

BOC Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3039527261/MN+Payroll+BOC+View+-+Data+Discovery|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3039527261/MN+Payroll+BOC+View+-+Data+Discovery|smart-link] 

Club View Wireframe: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_club&c=1|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_club&c=1|smart-link] 

Club Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3042312288/MN+Payroll+Club+View+-+Data+Discovery|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3042312288/MN+Payroll+Club+View+-+Data+Discovery|smart-link]
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the MN Payroll sub tab (Minor Contracts tab) Under the Minor Contracts dashboard, in the MN Payroll tab, there will be a collapsible section called "Breakdown"
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a collapsible section called "Breakdown"
AND This section will be placed under Player Summary section
AND under the section name, there will be a dropdown menu with the ability to select specific training period (Spring Training 2/23 - 3/29)
AND under the section name, there will be a dropdown menu with the ability to select a player
AND selecting a player will load that player's daily breakdown in the table
AND clicking on a player's name in the Player Summary section will populate the player's name in the dropdown and load that player's info in the table
AND the table will have the following columns:
- Date
- Amount
- Period
- Rate
- Details

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see additional details for each player on the Player Summary table in the MN Payroll dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN the muser is viewing the Player Summary table on the MN Payroll dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN to the left of the player's column there will be a column with a maximize/minimize button for each row
AND the buttons will default to show an expansion icon
AND when clicked on, the row will expand to show a more detailed view of the days that the player reported to training (and if clicked again, row collapses)
AND when the row is expanded, under the WT Days(x), ST Days(x), and FT Days(x) columns, will show the specific dates that the player reported to training
-- ex: 2/23 to 3/04
AND when the row is expanded, under the Champ Season, it will show the number of days the player reported to each MN team (AAA, AA, A)

title: As a MNC Admin, I want an Update Dates button on the Player Summary table for MN Payroll
custom_steps: When viewing the Minor Payroll widget
custom_expected:
Then there will be a Player Summary table
AND on the bottom right corner of the Player Summary table, there will be an Update Dates button
AND the Update Dates button will be grayed out if no player is currently selected
AND once the players are selected and the user clicks on the button, a modal will appear that will allow one to edit hte dates that the player reported to training for a selected period
AND the modal will have the players selected displayed under the Update Dates header
AND there will be a dropdown menu under the player name to select the training period
AND there will be a table to add date ranges that the player reported to training
AND the user will see the following action buttons -
- Add Date range
-- clicking this button will add a new row for date ranger
- Trash Can button
-- clicking this button will delete the date range row
- Update 
-- clicking this will commit changes, dismiss modal, and display a blue success notification
- Cancel
-- clicking this will dismiss modal without making updates
AND there will be a warning texct above the Update and Cancel button that says:
- This will overwrite any existing dates the player has for the period
AND users will only be allowed to specify dates within the selected training period
AND once the appropriate dates are updated, and the user selects Update Dates, "Dates Updated" message will appear

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a Player Summary section in the MN Payroll tab in Minor Contracts to show players' MN payroll earnings for different training periods
custom_preconds:
BOC View Wireframe: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_boc&c=1|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_boc&c=1|smart-link] 

BOC Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3039527261/MN+Payroll+BOC+View+-+Data+Discovery|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3039527261/MN+Payroll+BOC+View+-+Data+Discovery|smart-link] 

Club View Wireframe: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_club&c=1|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=mn_payroll_-_club&c=1|smart-link] 

Club Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3042312288/MN+Payroll+Club+View+-+Data+Discovery|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3042312288/MN+Payroll+Club+View+-+Data+Discovery|smart-link]
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Player Summary section on the Mn Payroll tab
custom_expected:
THEN this section will be placed under the ORG Summary section
AND under the section name, there will be a dropdown menu to select a MJ Club
AND under the section name, there will be a dropdown menu to select a particular MN team
-- There will be an All (club) Affiliates option
AND under the section name, there will be a textbox to search for specific players
AND the textbox will say "type to search players"
AND below the section name, the two dropdown menus, and the textbox, there will be a table with columns titled: - 
- Player
- Total
- Winter Training
- WT Days X(Y)
- Spring Training 
- ST Days X(Y)
- Champ Season
- Post Season
- AFL Season
- AFL Days
- Fall Training
- FT Days X(Y)
- Last Updated 
Untitled column
-view breakdown

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Offseason Training Periods Added to System Dates
custom_steps:
WHEN user is viewing the Systems Dates 

* There will be three new entries on the System Dates screen under the Minor League portion of the Baseball Ops section:
** Spring Training Period
** Fall Training Period
** Winter Training Period
* Each period will have a start and end date
custom_expected:
THEN there will be three new entries on the System Dates screen under the minor league portion of the Baseball Ops section
- Spring Training
- Fall Training
- Winter Training
AND each period will have a start and end date
